result.reason: RDP sessions don't inherit client DPI scaling factor — the DesktopScaleFactor property exists but is not auto-detected from the current monitor's DPI
result.approach: Auto-detect current monitor DPI via GetDpiForMonitor and pass matching DesktopScaleFactor to RDP ActiveX control at connect time; add an 'Auto' option to RDPDesktopScaleFactor enum that reads the client DPI dynamically

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"RDP sessions don't inherit client DPI scaling factor — the DesktopScaleFactor property exists but is not auto-detected from the current monitor's DPI","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/RDP/RdpProtocol.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/RDP/RdpProtocol8.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/DPI_Per_Monitor.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/RDP/RDPDesktopScaleFactor.cs"],"approach":"Auto-detect current monitor DPI via GetDpiForMonitor and pass matching DesktopScaleFactor to RDP ActiveX control at connect time; add an 'Auto' option to RDPDesktopScaleFactor enum that reads the client DPI dynamically"}
